uses the hammer: Vedal uses the Hammer at any point during the game
uses battery: Vedal uses the Battery at any point during the game
uses scissors: Vedal uses Mrs. Bomb Remote at any point during the game
uses nano armor generator: Vedal uses the Nano Armor Generator at any point during the game
buys from trader: Vedal buys items from the trader at any point during the game
loses to uberbot: Vedal loses to an uberbot at any point during the game
dies: Vedal dies at any point during the game
stuck on a puzzle: Vedal gets stuck on a puzzle. The definition of stuck in this case is not making any progress for 5 or more minutes
wanted level 3 or higher: Vedal gains a wanted level of 3 or higher at any point during the game
defeats bounty hunter: Vedal defeats a bounty hunter at any point during the game
loses to bounty hunter: Vedal loses to a bounty hunter at any point during the game
obtains lonely wizbot: Vedal obtains the Lonely Wizbot card at any point during the game
obtains ourobot: Vedal obtains the Ourobot card at any point during the game
exits act 3: Vedal finishes Act 3, ending this run of the game
